Bootstrap and asp.net 4.0 master pages

Apr 10, 2013

After some toiling and searching on line for a demo that includes asp.net inside a master page, I came across the blog post at geekswithblogs.net. However, the solution to use Resolve URL did not work correctly. After some debugging, I found a post at stack over flow using Script Manager. This finally allowed the jQuery and other scripts to work.

I have uploaded the code into my Github Repo, so hopefully someone will find this demo useful. I have also included the example from Twitter bootstrap called "Basic marketing site".

Please note this example uses web forms, and C#.

Update: Check out the demo: http://jenntes-demos.azurewebsites.net/
